name: Coding Bootcamps
tagline: Guide to choosing a full-time Coding Bootcamp
body:
### Choosing a full-time Coding Bootcamp

We wrote this brief guide as a tool to help you decide whether to attend an intense, full-time coding bootcamp.

### About the Author
David Kim (@dklounge) organizes [Ruby Rookies](http://rubyrookies.github.io/) and [Product Management Fast-Track](http://www.meetup.com/productlovers/) in San Francisco.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
